backend/main.mo: Defines core types and maps for salons, bookings, images, and user profiles, with seed logic for default Swiss salons and mixins for authorization and storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries describing required frontend behaviors, affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains a JSON-like mapping of frontend file paths to short descriptive summaries of their functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Minimal wrapper that renders and exports AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Main UI implementing the V25 AETHER GENESIS experience with salon data, Helix navigation, filtering, galleries, and interactive components.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the AuthHeader component.
Empty placeholder file for the CreateSalonForm component.
frontend/src/components/MemberCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MemberCard component.
frontend/src/components/MonopolyModeSwit: Empty placeholder file for the MonopolyModeSwitch component.
frontend/src/components/MotionButton.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the MotionButton component.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBadge.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the PremiumBadge component.
frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for the ProfileSetupModal component.
frontend/src/components/ProSalonWizard.t: Empty placeholder file for the ProSalonWizard component.
frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for the ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the RevenueChart component.
frontend/src/components/SalonListSection: Empty placeholder file for the SalonListSection component.
frontend/src/components/VipDashboard.tsx: Empty placeholder file for the VipDashboard component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with auto-initialization of access control and cache invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login state using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style salon descriptions based on category, tags, type, and city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins including typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing version, architectural resets, UX direction, and known issues.
